title: Generate Original Data Files
description: When enabled, the original data files will be generated in the output directory

title: Search
description: Specify the font name to search for in the fontFamily attribute. More in README.md https://github.com/lmc-eu/spirit-design-system/tree/main/exporters/tokens#font-family-replacement

title: Replace
description: Specify the font name that will replace the searched font in the fontFamily attribute.
